item.title: A Day of Hope, Prayer, and Clean-up in Ferguson
item.description: Dellena Jones’s 911 Hair Salon was attacked at about 11:15 PM by a small band of young men. The break-in and robbery occurred close to the time of the first shooting. The hair salon is less than 100 yards from the scene of the shooting. But that didn’t stop volunteers from St. Louis Tea Party Coalition and friends from helping. [caption width="300” id="attachment_16631” align="alignright”]Volunteers pose for a picture after helping clean and repair 911 Hair Salon in Ferguson.
